job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: stronguAbout YumibrbrustrongWere on a mission raise the standard for what we feed our babies When our founder Angela gave birth to her daughter Elodie she learned that the first 1000 days of her life were the most impactful to her growth and development yet the baby food options available were filled with sugar and often sat on the shelf for up to 2 years We formed Yumi to give kids a healthy start with nutrition and content for the first 1000 days of life We started by delivering fresh pureed food to your home and are growing to provide many more solutions to young families Join us in shaking up the 48 billion domestic baby food marketbrbrData scientists at Yumi have the opportunity to work on a variety of challenges to help scale Yumi Youll be part of a small but mighty team of creative problem solvers who are leveraging data to move the needle on childhood nutritionbrbrstronguWere Excited About Candidates WhobrustrongulliEnjoy databasing in Mysql or PostgresliliWrite code with Python R or JulialiliHave experience scaling data operationsliliAre curious about how things work and dont stop until you find outliliPossess a mastery of googlefu to find an answer to any problemliliCare about humans and the prospect of creating healthier happier future generationsliul
